description:
Comfort for growing single-track hounds and junior rouleurs. Designed for young riders, the Zig-Zag Shorts have the same attention to detail and quality as the grownup model: flat seams, grippy elastic cuffs and reflective trim.Made of nylon, polyester and LYCRA that's durable and quick to dry.8-panel design provides full range of motion.Flatlock seams won't chafe on long rides.Encased elastic waistband stays put.Padded, contoured chamois.Reflective trim heightens visibility.Grippy elastic cuffs prevent slippage.

Body fit



Fit guide

Technical garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Tight, with no room to spare.





Very close fit, with a bit of room.





Generous, but not oversized.





Oversized with lots of room for layers.


All MEC men’s and boy’s pants are regular rise.
